content.raw:
Indeed, I'm getting a whopping 12kHz rostopic rate on the contact sensor topics
`/atlas/l_foot_contact` and `/atlas/r_foot_contact` myself.

Anyways, as specified in the [DRCSim User Guide](http://gazebosim.org/wiki/DRC/UserGuide), only `/atlas/force_torque_sensors` will be supported; `/atlas/l_foot_contact` and `/atlas/r_foot_contact` are only offered for convenience of development.  I'll go ahead and switch these to using [geometry_msgs/WrenchStamped](http://ros.org/doc/api/geometry_msgs/html/msg/WrenchStamped.html), and will rename them to something less official, e.g. `/atlas/l_foot_contact_debug` and `/atlas/r_foot_contact_debug` to indicate that these topics will not be available for competition.
content.html:
Indeed, I'm getting a whopping 12kHz rostopic rate on the contact sensor topics /atlas/l_foot_contact and /atlas/r_foot_contact myself.

Anyways, as specified in the DRCSim User Guide, only /atlas/force_torque_sensors will be supported; /atlas/l_foot_contact and /atlas/r_foot_contact are only offered for convenience of development. I'll go ahead and switch these to using geometry_msgs/WrenchStamped, and will rename them to something less official, e.g. /atlas/l_foot_contact_debug and /atlas/r_foot_contact_debug to indicate that these topics will not be available for competition.
